name: Facebook PHP SDK
body:
### Welcome to Facebook's PHP SDK.
This webpage contains the resources needed to learn and understand the Facebook PHP SDK and the OpenGraph.
Since I am a beginner myself, it is easy for me to present the necessary tutorials in a very simple and lucid form.

### Basic Instructions
Since this is a local project, a certain setup is needed.
    
***
    1. Download [WAMPServer](http://www.wampserver.com/en/) or [MAMPServer](http://www.mamp.info/en/index.html) and      install it on your computer. 
    2. Go to the /www/ folder in your system root.
    3. Create a folder "GraphAPI" and in it create folder "Facebook_PHP_SDK"
    4. Place all contents of zip file into this folder.
    5. Go to http://localhost/GraphAPI/Facebook_PHP_SDK/index.php on your browser.

### Authors and Contributors
This webpage and repo is maintained by Kanishka Ganguly (@kanishkaganguly),
2nd year engineering student at Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra.

### Support or Contact
Contact me at kanishkaganguly2002@gmail.com for any help or details.
tagline: A demonstration of the PHP SDK by Facebook
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
